name: Half-Dragon Template
description: A Medium humanoid creature bearing the traits of a dragon, wearing plate armor.
memorable: Possesses a breath weapon that deals significant fire damage.
goals: Typically operates with the pride and ambition of a dragon.
relations: May ally with full dragons or other draconic creatures.
environment: Can be found in diverse environments, often in places associated with dragons.
strengths: Resistance to fire damage and the ability to use a devastating fire breath attack.
attacks: Makes multiple attacks with a longsword or shortsword, and can also fire a heavy crossbow.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which deals substantial damage in a cone.
equipment: Wears plate armor and wields a longsword and a heavy crossbow.
senses: Has blindsight with a radius of 10 feet.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and has decent Perception skills.
additional_information: Gains damage resistance based on its dragon color.
Can be customized with different dragon qualities depending on the base creature.
Combines humanoid abilities with draconic traits effectively.
May serve as a leader among lesser creatures or adventurers.
Facilitates the blending of dragon lore and humanoid societies.
test_queries: creature with fire resistance and breath weapon
